name: The 'Intertelekom' confiscated equipment. More than a million subscribers were left without communication
info: On Friday evening the Ukrainian Security Service raided the office in Odessa major Ukrainian telecom provider 'Intertelecom'. During the search were confiscated equipment, which is why no communication left more than 1 million subscribers throughout Ukraine.
info_2: As it became known AIN.UA from an anonymous source, the security forces have disconnected the router through which all traffic to the subscribers' Intertelekoma. Withdrawal continues: take away computer equipment and personal staff. Lawyers in the office is not allowed, saying that a special operation carried out. According to the source, the removal is carried out in Odessa employees of the Main Directorate of the Security Service.
